job_description:
ADGA Group Consultants Inc. is hiring a Senior Software Engineer to provide advice on various options that simulation can be used in support of research, testing and operational training for Royal Canadian Air Force clients.
This position, based out of Trenton, Ontario, requires excellent communications skills in both oral and written formats and with strong presentation skills. Because there is no internet in the lab environment, an ability to think on your feet is necessary. Experience with simulation software development is desired but not essential. Software languages include Java, C++, scripting in various other languages such as Python.
The platform being used is referred to as the Advanced Framework for Simulation and Modeling (AFSIM). Having a military background to help understand the environment is desirable but not mandatory.

Qualifications

Mandatory Qualifications
Degree or diploma in Computer Science, Mathematics, Sciences, or Engineering, with Modeling and Simulation courses
Minimum 7 years designing, coding, and testing C++ and Java programming
Minimum 6 years working in a Microsoft, and Unix or Linux operating system environment
Strong knowledge of simulation and modelling systems and how these systems interact
Experience working with: Python, scripting languages, Git repository, and GitLab
Nice to Have
CMSP (Certified Modelling and Simulation Professional) Certificate or an equivalent industry-recognized qualification
Experience programming in a modeling and simulation environment
Experience developing simulation systems
Experienceworking with Image Generation and display systems

Additional Information

Must currently hold FederalGovernment Secret Clearance
Copies of Degree/Diploma/Certifications will be required
